## CorpProductData type

Product rating information

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type CorpProductData = {
  name: string;
  verb: string;
  desc: string;
  ratingWeights: {
    aesthetics?: number;
    durability?: number;
    features?: number;
    quality?: number;
    performance?: number;
    reliability?: number;
  };
};
```
